"Quilla": "Hey! I've been waiting for you!"
"Wait, don't tell me! This is about the Liminal Sign, right?"
"I found this note earlier and it's been buggin' the heck out of me."
"\"Got too caught up with exploring. Already dark out.\""
"\"This place is always so dark. Didn't even notice the time.\""
"\"Not safe in this area. Should head back before I run into any enemies.\""
"\"On my way back, I saw <red>what looked like a Resta Sign behind some of the rocks.<c>\""
"\"Maybe the rumored Liminal Sign?"
"\"Went back the next day. Couldn't find it anywhere\""
"\"Eyes must've been playing tricks on me or something\""
"This was written a long time ago, but it doesn't seem to have received much attention to this day."
"Hmmm... The part where it mentions \"behind some rocks\" makes it sound like this person was in a rocky area..."
"It also says \"not safe in this area\", so maybe... in a volcanic region of Stia?"
"Why not check it out?"
"Wanna read the note once more?"
"Mkay."
"Ah, you're back. Sorry for making you run around all over the place."
"Let's think about this for a moment."
"It's a place that's \"always so dark\" and \"not safe\", right?"
"The only places we haven't checked are Retem and Kvaris..."
"Wait... Dark..."
"AH! Maybe it's in a cave?"
"But which one...? There's so many..."
"Wait, I've got it! What about that one cave along the Kvaris mountain trail?"
"I've got a feeling this'll be the place! Go check it out!"
"What about that one cave along the Kvaris mountain trail?"
"I've got a feeling this'll be the place! Go check it out!"
